definitions.definition: Cloth-covered frame used for protection against rain or sun.
definitions.example: Quick, grab that umbrella before you get rained on!
The fighters provide a defensive air umbrella over the battle group.

definitions.definition: Something that covers a wide range of concepts, purposes, groups, etc.
definitions.example: The test facility was established under the umbrella of the company's quality program.

definitions.definition: The main body of a jellyfish, excluding the tentacles.
definitions.example: Jellyfish are composed of more than 90% water and most of their umbrella mass is made up of gelatinous material.

definitions.definition: An umbrella-shaped reflector with a white or silvery inner surface, used to diffuse a nearby light.
To cover or protect, as if by an umbrella.
To form the dome shape of an open umbrella.
